website_summaries.verdict: A gentle peel that's worth considering for consumers who are fighting break-out prone skin, but the effectiveness for other skin problems may be minimal for most users.
pros: A 30% salicylic acid peel that targets blemishes, large pores, psoriasis, and more
cons: Conflicting reports on its effectiveness, especially for skin issues that are difficult to treat such as scars and rough spots

customer_reviews.title: It's a headliner!
customer_reviews.text: Received the salicylic acid on Friday. Was immediately put on this plantar wart that my daughter has. (2 times a day) Today Tuesday ( 5 days later) the plantar wart fell off.
customer_reviews.author: AriesRam

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for stubborn warts!
customer_reviews.text: Tried a ton of things to get rid of these warts on my thumb. Nothing worked, not even my Dr freezing them. So I Googled cures, and read about Salicylic acid, found this and decided to give it a shot. And applying it with a Q-tip once a week for a month to all four warts, they peeled off and are gone! No scarring either. I was so self-conscious about those but not anymore. 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Guy Fyffe

customer_reviews.title: First time use! WOW.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in the mail today and let me say... WOW. It’s powerful. I have rather oily skin and I’ve been changing up my skin routine and thought this would make a great addition. I would recommend getting some gauze pads that you might find in a first aid kit. They seemed to be easier to manage than a cotton ball. I would definitely keep the baking soda/water solution close by during your first use! I couldn’t even do the entire 60 seconds the packing suggested without it feeling too uncomfortable. After rinsing I could feel an immediate difference in my skin tone. 4 stars as I’m still getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: kosmickarma87

customer_reviews.title: I am indeed fortunate
customer_reviews.text: I am 72 years old, but only recently learned about salicylic acid and what it could do for my problem of overproduction of keratin. I'm very thankful for this product. I won't go into any details, but it has lessened my miseries.
customer_reviews.author: Orie

customer_reviews.title: Not Terrible But Question Concentration Claim
customer_reviews.text: I'm not making any accusations, I'm not a psychic. However given my experience with BHA home peels which is considerable, I'm not sure I trust that this is a 30% concentration. Immediately post-peel, my skin was completely stripped of oil and dirt so I'm guessing it's definitely stronger than 8% but based on the way it felt on my skin (no tingling or penetrating sensations at all), it seemed closer to maybe a 15% concentration.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Moriarty

customer_reviews.title: NOT 30% salicilic acid.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the good reviews. Either the company send me the wrong product or change it’s composition because it did not do anything. I have been using 17% and it works better. This 30% and just water is the same. Where is the quality control?
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Great product - results to match!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I have used salicylic acid products for years for my skin and had professional peels too! This product is a game changer. Repeated use yields great results. I was not sure what 19.00 would get me, but I am so glad I tried it. This will cause a little flaking but nothing that will make you hide! Regular use reveals cumulative benefits for sure! When using I always keep a baking soda/water paste mixture in a bowl nearby to neutralize as soon as my timer goes off and I start to rinse.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: This is strong so use with caution! I’ve had salicylic peels in a Dermatoloy office, it became too expensive so I began buying the 20% grade from an online company and did my own peel at home for yrs. THIS one is 30% which is considered safer in a doctors office, and that’s because it is strong enough to cause burns if left on too long. Start with 1-2 min on and gradually increase the time you leave this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Is there even any salicylic acid in this?
customer_reviews.text: I swear they just forgot to add the salicylic acid to this. I was using 17% on my warts and it would quite quickly create a layer of dead skin, and it would burn a little. I got this stuff expecting it to work faster than the 17% stuff, but NO. It does nothing. It doesn't tingle, it doesn't remove any dead skin, nothing. It just evaporates and my skin looks exactly the same as before. I may as well be putting water on my warts. Do they just forget to add the salicylic acid to some batches or what???
customer_reviews.author: ace2904

customer_reviews.title: ineffective
customer_reviews.text: I have used other peels that were lower concentration but have a better consistency, more gel like so they stayed in place and were more effective. Wanted to return product but it is not eligible for return which is my fault for purchasing something that cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Satisfing Results
customer_reviews.text: Use sparingly on face and neck . Over usage will BURN skin. However, it cleared up most areas of face acne and a few dark spots . Recommend to use in small dosages. Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Cook

customer_reviews.title: The company has zero support and responds to questions in the most useless generic manner possible
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not even close to 30%, probably less than 10% so its not really a value. The company has zero support and responds to questions in the most useless generic manner possible, despite repeated attempts. They do ship promptly, but the marketing of differing strengths is misleading at best. Salicytic Acid is useful for mild skin remediation and can be used at home safely. Expect some slow relatively inexpensive improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Maui

customer_reviews.title: Only acid to completely eat through any fats and oils
customer_reviews.text: Be sure you know what your doing before playing around with this. It does it’s job and does its job well
customer_reviews.author: jackalyn brown

customer_reviews.title: Effectiveness Depends on What it is Used For
customer_reviews.text: I have had oily skin since 10 yr's of age and now as a mature adult, I am left with enlarged pores and some acne scarring. Thought this salicylic acid peel would be beneficial because I have read that salicylic acid penetrates better into oily pore openings than glycolic acid. This stuff is strong it has made my eyes water at times when I have used it. It can make your skin peel too if left on for a long time...and can cause some pretty bad redness and burning as well. USE WITH CAUTION! It can help clear out blackheads but doesn't really do a whole lot for long-standing enlarged pores.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works, but heed my warning, don't leave it on for too long or you'll get a little mark on your face like I did. Fortunately it went right away, but longer is not necessarily the way to go. I'm a huge believer in all things glycolic and have been using fruity acids since they came out-lucky me, at 56 that and no sun have made me look years younger without surgery or expensive procedures. Since people ask me all the time what I do, here is the best advice ever, stay out of the sun, use exfoliators and avail yourself of all the new and nifty serums and creams containing the acids and you'll look great!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Burt

customer_reviews.title: Great product👍 maryetta/ oregon
customer_reviews.text: This brand really works. Wish I had b/a my arms were very dotted from years in sun and I was thrilled to see all the peels!! Every week I did 1-2 layers for about 6 months. Now my spots are hardly noticable and skin all much softer! I have always used acid creams on face neck and decol. but forgot arms now I match up! Scottsdale wedd. here I come.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: salicylic acid percentage
customer_reviews.text: I use this for toenail fungus removal and slowly but surely it's working. use it several times, pause clip toenails, use it several more times, pause clip toenails; repeat until all toenail fungus damage is removed. Also a complete foot peel will cure your athlete's foot problems until re infected.
customer_reviews.author: William Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Anyone That Has Acne Or Has Skin Damaged From Previous Acne!
customer_reviews.text: This will clear acne like nothing! The stuff they sell in the store is usually like 2% salicylic acid and this is 30% so you will need to be careful and test it out for only a few seconds the first time you use it because it really is that powerful! I'd recommend this product to anyone who has acne or skin that has been damaged by acne, it will clear it up right away!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been applying this stuff for a week, and it has absolutely no effect. I don't think it is salicylic acid at all. Or if it is, it is extremely weak. It certainly is NOT 30% salicylic acid. I may as well be just putting water on. It doesn't peel, it doesn't change any aspect of the skin I apply it to. It is a worthless product. And to make it worse, the seller does not accept returns. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyB

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great to help exfoliate old skin, helps with big pours and Acne. I love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Fatimeh Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Instructions on how to use your product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to remove Seborrheic Keratosis, the problem is that I don’t know how to apply it. The only instructions that came with the product is how to do a facial peel. Could you send me instructions on how to remove my Seborrheic Keratosis. Then I would be happy to do a review. Thank You Bev Jones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hello Clarice...
customer_reviews.text: This will legit peel your face off. Dr. Hannibal Lecter approved. Start light with short application durations then work your way up. You'll definitely need to put the lotion on the skin after. Or else...
customer_reviews.author: Elio Sottoscritti

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my acne and active pimples
customer_reviews.text: I like salicylic acid for my acne and especially pimples when they get crazy... I just apply the acid and leave it on till I take shower if it’s not face! It dries them and that’s all I need
customer_reviews.author: ipek

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot..
customer_reviews.text: Just be careful if you are a picker! If you use this on broken skin you could make matters worse ! I have to pick a day that I have been kind to my face or else I end up with scabs that take a few days to heal...Please read and follow the directions this is powerful stuff but it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing for acne or my face at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item before and I loved it. I bought it again August 2018 and it did nothing. I bought it for acne, pores, and acne scars which it did nothing. I do not recommend buying this product I just wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Me We

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once. It seems like a nice Salicylic acid. Perhaps more gentle than another 30% Salicylic acid than I have used (which is why gave it 4 instead of 5 stars). That being said, that is ok with me right now because I haven't done regular acid peels for a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bair

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it did anything after 7 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this for the first time. I felt no stinging or burning effect even after leaving it on for 7 minutes. I did follow the instructions carefully except the length of time I left it on. Thinking this didn't do anything. Will try again leaving on a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: As described -  just as good any any other brand, fast ship
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Salicylic Acid Chemical Peel for many years such that my skin can tolerate 30%. This brand is just as good any any other brand, and it's reasonably priced, fast ship.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystel

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used for keratosis. Be careful. Worked well. Multiple treatments still
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Gentle but effective. I didnt rinse off just left on one pass over night. It lightened some old acne red spots.
customer_reviews.author: Criscat

customer_reviews.title: Use it once a month with great success.
customer_reviews.text: This product helps keep my skin clear of blemishes and blackheads. Use it once a month with great success.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Peel it for me
customer_reviews.text: This product is great but I urge all who use to be cautious with any type of peel. I’ve had professional peels done so I know my tolerance and was able to achieve the goals for my face. Doesn’t take much and I will be able to do more frequent peels to help control my pores and it tames the redness from rosacea.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Sayachack

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong product so be careful and test in a small area first. It works much better than others I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ennis

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good..I will let more update if this one will clear my acne!i wish I could put for over night so I will see the real result but I’m scared it’ll burn my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn-che

customer_reviews.title: Really does the job
customer_reviews.text: This is an early post but I must say it is a great peel. Yes, it burns but I find just like other reviews if you have a hair dryer close on cold it takes the stinging down. I also use aquaphor around my eyes, lips, and nostrils so they do not burn. You can't beat the price and will be thrilled with the results. Avoid the baking soda rinse that I find makes my face burn more. Just cool water and rinse your face thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cibella

customer_reviews.title: I think this product is great if you use it with caution
customer_reviews.text: I used salicylic acid to prevent pimples. While it did help to dry out certain areas of my skin where i would have a lot of pimples, i had no idea how strong the product was. After first use my face was left red, and i had scars all over my face. but the scab fell of soon! however,i did have marks. Perhaps, i didn't neutralize it? I think this product is great if you use it with caution.
customer_reviews.author: randomorange

customer_reviews.title: It was like putting water on my face : (
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed salicylic acid 30% should tingle and tighten, this was like water no effect at all : ( I didn't want to give it any stars but I couldn't submit this review without one
customer_reviews.author: brette

customer_reviews.title: treatment for scars warts and blemishes.
customer_reviews.text: this stuff makes your skin harden and peel. and if thats what you need, its pretty awesome. thank you. it was very helpful. it should be noted that it is a very thin liquid, and it will burn the skin anywhere it touches. not oil based.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to buy it again when this runs out. Works wonders on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Bonifant

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am a 51 year old male who is battling the beginning of age spots. I use this weekly for 4 weeks. Take a 2 week break than switch over to glycolic acid weekly for 4 weeks. Than a month off and repeat. I use a cotton ball to apply and leave it on for about4-5 minutes. It stings but it is still tolerable. I can say this has definitely helped lighten the spots as well as just an overall nice treatment for my face.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Gentle
customer_reviews.text: Good, gentle peel that you can use at home to freshen the skin without risking burns or flaking.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great for active acne!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I get a zit, I run for this bottle :-) I apply it at night for about 15 minutes (had to work my way up to this) then I use baking soda and water to wash it off. The zit is gone by morning! Wish I had found this years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t buy it again but it might be good for someone
customer_reviews.author: Anne Krisp

customer_reviews.title: Works on tough cystic acne
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to dry out cystic acne on my back that didn’t respond to other treatments. Drying only occurred on the spots, and not the skin around them. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Closer to an essential oil than a peel. Useless
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely laughable. I have a 20% Salicylic acid peel that works, so I thought I would take it up a notch. This 30% felt like an essential oil. It is clearly well below 20%. I left it on my skin for 20 minutes just to make sure it absolutely isn’t useless and all it still didn’t do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lawyer101

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 31 and have suffort with acne the last 10 years. I have scaring on my face and dark red blemishes. I got this and do a peel ones a week for the last month and my face is completely healing. I've stopped using my prescription acne cream because this is just amazing. My dark red blemishes are disappearing. I wish I had known about this long time ago so I wouldn't have scares.
customer_reviews.author: azpisces

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: No redness, no tingling. Absolutely no effect on my skin and because of the supposed caustic properties was not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori E. Opal

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely did the job!! It is strong so first time user only leave it on 1-2 minutes. I’ve paid hundreds of dollars to have this professionally done and this worked better!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Be careful but expect decent results
customer_reviews.text: It worked decently, I only suggest applying it once at a time. I applied it a little to often it took awhile to heal but I was satisfied with the results bc I had deep blackheads that caused blemishes and this is the only thing that has worked since all the others had tea tree oil and I am allergic.
customer_reviews.author: Mzg25

customer_reviews.title: For my wife. Makes her happy. Makes me happy. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife. Don’t know much but she said her skin needed and she was happy. That makes it a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Link

customer_reviews.title: It might work better for you
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to instantly make my pores smaller and skin more even. I didn't continue to use it, because I'm not sure if it was helping with acne, or aggravating it further. It might work better for you, it just seems a little harsh for me--although harshness was expected, so I still rate this product a 4.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Not as strong as I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my warts and was hoping it would really burn into them but it just, very slowly, dries them out. I don’t have patience for it, really.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Good DIY option for acne/pimple relief
customer_reviews.text: If you are trying out chemical peels at home this is a good one to include in your mix. It's great to add to a peel as well as apply directly on a pimple with a Q-tip; the pimple will dry up right away and you will probably need to apply an oil or moisturizer around it if the acid gets on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy this from them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this product from them for two years now. It does exactly as it's supposed to do. Warning...if you're a first time user, start with a lower %. I've been peeling for four years, so I know my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Rollins

customer_reviews.title: IT DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this since february its june now and it doesn't work!
customer_reviews.author: starling_75

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This has become a routine part of of skincare. Always works well. I've ordered 3 times and all have been great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It leaves my skin silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not 30%! more like 5%
customer_reviews.text: product is completely off! waste of time and money. Cant even get a return/refund. product seems to be watered down!
customer_reviews.author: Mura

customer_reviews.title: Purchased multiple times!
customer_reviews.text: Very good peel! Strong enough to get rid of acne. Mild sting and light peeling. Ive purchased a few bottles already and will continue to do so! Fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca birnie

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple of years off and I needed it
customer_reviews.author: IzoSuave

customer_reviews.title: Leaking bottle
customer_reviews.text: Received the bottle and was leaking in the package. see picture.
customer_reviews.author: WS

customer_reviews.title: Strong and effective
customer_reviews.text: I was using a 20% peel and not seeing results. After 4 of these peels spaced a 7-10 days apart I have visible results. My skin is smoother, brighter and deep-seated cysts that nothing else has budged are disappearing. Fast shipping and clear and easy instructions make this product and seller a must-try for anyone struggling with oily acne-prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ohl

customer_reviews.title: Mom says it works for her. She is on her second bottle.
customer_reviews.text: My mother uses this and she says it works. She's bought it more then once and I'm sure she will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: N. Luna

customer_reviews.title: Concentrated Rubbing Alcohol
customer_reviews.text: This product is just rubbing alcohol! The smell alone overwhelmed me, and I immediately knew I just bought myself $20 rubbing alcohol. I’ve gotten plenty of chemical peels before, but this is not even close! Don’t bother buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Winters

customer_reviews.title: Very effective / potent
customer_reviews.text: Takes your face clean off! Works very well at what it's supposed to do, just don't overuse it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Zapped Zit!
customer_reviews.text: Great for those pesky under the skin pimples! Love this product! 3rd bottle
customer_reviews.author: Steve Holt

customer_reviews.title: It works for wart removal
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for warts. It makes them fall of within 5 days. I put in the white part of a bandaid and cover the wart, within days the warts fall of. Very happy with this product, recommended it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Salicylic acid peels have prevent acne better than anything I have every used in the last 4 years. I use weekly for 6 applications then maintain by doing peels every 2-3 weeks. I only wish I knew about salicylic acid sooner.
customer_reviews.author: thereisalwayshope

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have put this on twice & nothing. No burning, no changing color on brown spots. It’s not working at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t cause any peeling, I had worked in a medical spa but quit do to finishing up my medical program, ( && could only order when the spa did )I thought I could order a peel to do my own at home, && I had no change. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good,I didn’t notice any problem,it is soft mild skin peel and kind of weak results
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great Facial Peel
customer_reviews.text: I use this in conjunction with am clay face mask and derma roller once per week. It doesn't peel immediately, but will start to peel in acne areas 2-3 days afterwards. Perfect for keeping acne at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used after the LAVO cleanser, this peel controls my over active oil glands
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Controls blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice a week to control blackheads on my face. Works amazingly!
customer_reviews.author: heather gayle burns

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Skin Care Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of this product. I use it as part of my skin care routine. It is very effective in clearing acne breakouts quickly and to keep my skin looking smooth and youthful.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Not strong
customer_reviews.text: Does not feel like it is 30 % strength. I feel only Slight tingling when I apply.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this twice so for. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Good job with acne prone skin
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for over a year now because of my acne prone skin. This 30% strength has been just right to not only prevent blemishes in my T-zone but to apply on blemishes so they don't last long. I would definitely recommend it. If I need a full peel, I have a 70% solution.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Singer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product for doing at-home chemical peels. I like to use it after a gentle scrub with micro-dermabrasion crystals. I am also impressed by the customer service of the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Burned my skin really bad and the roll gets stuck and doesn't apply evenly.
customer_reviews.author: rosalie garcia

customer_reviews.title: A zit remedy that actually works...fast
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with how effective salicylic acid is in zapping out zits..after just one day, they start to simmer down, and after two, they are clearly on the fadeaway. Normally they last at least a week without treatment, so I whole heartedly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Bro. DV

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a burning sensation but that is NORMAL ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a burning sensation but that is NORMAL, be sure to read and watch tutorials and you-tube videos before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri/Kristofer

customer_reviews.title: The product arrived neatly packaged in a professional and timely ...
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived neatly packaged in a professional and timely manner. This is my first time trying Salicylic Acid Peel. In the past, I tried TCA. I believe the Salicylic Acid is for a light to moderated peel. I experienced improved skin texture, coloration, and youthful glow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skin peel.
customer_reviews.text: I used this to remove a wart on my nose. It left a red scar which faded over time and in my opinion is much better than having a wart on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Meatbomb

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Worked just like goin to the spa and paying $100
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this order
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, and the company shipped this to me right on time. I have no complaints with this product or this company, I'm very happy with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a gentle peel!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great gentle peel! I can use 1 or 2 times a week! Makes skin feel and look younger after 1 month!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Beverly

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Great info came with it on application use and extra gauge. Packaged great for shipping. i use this for sun damage I have and it's made a big difference in my wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: Catetz

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a couple of times during the last months, it works wonders! I am slowly gaining confidence in my bare face thanks to this, my hyperpigmentation is slowly disappearing!. Would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Susan wambui

customer_reviews.title: Like a salon Peel
customer_reviews.text: It is just like a peel you would have at a skin therapist , it burns a little bit does the trick
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great for problem inflammed skin
customer_reviews.text: Great for problem, inflamed skin. I have oily skin. This is great. Use sparingly or with your normal night cream. Good for clearing dark acne spots. I also use a small amount with my makeup to cover spots. I made my own BB solution (smile). Stick with it and it won't take long to see results. Be consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Clean all my acne
customer_reviews.text: Amazing peel, it is so strong, i have to diluted it a bit with water before application. But the peel is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: monruw

customer_reviews.title: Looking good & fresh
customer_reviews.text: This solution is perfect for peeling the bad skin & to show ur beautiful pink skin and recommended for young girls specially if they ve skin problems like pigments & dark spots
customer_reviews.author: Noora

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Im amazed by this product it has cleared my skin and prevents breakouts and has diminished my acne scars and dark spots i will buy this again
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: ... different brand of 20% and it seemed to work better. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a different brand of 20% and it seemed to work better. Unfortunately, amazon no longer carries it
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered 20% on here before and could barely tolerate it on my skin for the entire time recommended. this one did not stin
customer_reviews.text: Not very potent...I have ordered 20% on here before and could barely tolerate it on my skin for the entire time recommended. this one did not sting or anything..I think I got a rotten deal.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: I love salicylic acid for my acne
customer_reviews.text: Salicylic acid has maintained my acne at bay. I find that the 30 is a bit strong and the 20 I can use more often with less peeling but the same effect. I would use the 30 once a month at most.
customer_reviews.author: BVM

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It didnt work as expected.... I dont think this is 30% salicylic acid. No improvement after several use
customer_reviews.author: OlamideFolarin

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Product works very well in my case. This is the 2nd time I bought it. Also, with the same product with 20% Acid skin chemical, I have tried this too, I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Travid T. Duong

customer_reviews.title: strong medicine
customer_reviews.text: This is good, very very strong. Use in Tues and by Sat skin should peel off. Use gently
customer_reviews.author: Eddiefromtheblock

product_meta.title: SALICYLIC Acid Peel 30% Chemical Peel with Beta Hydroxy BHA For Rosacea, Blackheads, Whiteheads, Clogged Pores, Seborrheic Keratosis, Wart Remover, Dandruff, Bumpy Oily Acne Skin (1 oz / 30ml)
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Ounce

 Revive Your Skin & Enjoy The Amazing Effects Of Salicylic Acid Peel Brought To You By Skin Beauty Solutions! 

 



 Are you looking for a high-end quality chemical peel to help you battle against your oil, acne-prone skin? 

 



 Have you tried multiple similar products in the past but ended up being disappointed at their ineffectiveness? 

 



 Would you opt for a superior peeling solution that will revive your skin, clean your pores, and reduce your acne, without costing you a fortune? 

 



 If so, then Skin Beauty Solutions has the solution to your skin care problems! 

 



 Our chemical peel contains four powerful ingredients that will help renew your skin, loosen and remove aging cells, oil, and debris, and leave it perfectly soft and healthy! 

 



 Salicylic Acid: A peeling agent that helps with skin conditions such as acne, warts, calluses, corns, psoriasis, seborrhea dermatitis, dandruff, ichthyosis and much more! It is oil-soluble and lipophilic, so it penetrates sebum-filled follicles and cleans them out! 

 



 Propylene Glycol & Alcohol: Both are organic alcohols that clean your skin and allow the peel to be more efficient. 

 



 Hexylene Glycol: A solvent and viscosity agent that makes the peeling spreadable and easy to use.
feature_bullets: REJUVENATE YOUR SKIN! This incredible, highly effective chemical peeling acid will help remove the outer layer of your skin, reducing the oil, and cleaning the pores, thus leaving you with a healthy, radiant skin!
EFFECTIVELY TREAT MULTIPLE SKIN CONDITIONS! Help reduce acne inflammation and scars, sun damage, blemishes, blackheads, whiteheads, acne, psoriasis, and clogged pores – all with one simple treatment!
IDEAL FOR OILY, SENSITIVE SKIN! Salicylic acid is a lipid-soluble, keratolytic peeling agent that works efficiently with oily, sensitive skin as well as those people suffering from rosacea!

YOUR SATISFACTION IS OUR TOP PRIORITY! We at Skin Beauty Solutions make a point of using nothing but the best, natural and effective ingredients for our products, 100% Satisfaction Guaranteed or your money back!
